website_summaries.verdict: Extremely high-quality guitar from a respected manufacturer. A good choice for avid players.
pros: The best sound quality of all the top-selling acoustic guitars on our shortlist
cons: Reports of loose strap button on a few models

customer_reviews.title: You can pay more but for very little money you can have a really great guitar.
customer_reviews.text: Great guitar at this price point. Want to make it better? For so little money you can add lighter strings, a bone saddle, bone nut and pins. It's not necessary but they may help some. A bunch of small improvements put together make a big difference. What really does make a difference is having the action set up properly. Lowering it made it much easier to play for me. The finish and craftsmanship on this guitar is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Sky

customer_reviews.title: At this price point there isn't a better made guitar
customer_reviews.text: I've been playing guitar actively for 40 years. I was looking for a dreadnought cutaway with pre-amp. At this price point there isn't a better made guitar. I would have to spend 2-3 times as much for rosewood back, sides, fret board and saddle for a Taylor or Martin.My first guitar was a Yamaha, so I was happy to find another that took me back. It is aesthetically flawless. I think the Fishman in my Martin Custom X is a tad stronger but I can EQ that; and I love the tuner. If it matters to you, it is made in China. (I thought Yamahas were Japanese).Sounds amazing un-plugged with great bottom end. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ssmigs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: I'm a rookie at guitar knowledge but I do know if something is put together with quality. The FG 830 electro acoustic is beautiful. I eye scanned every square inch and there is no defect. The binding is smooth and uniform. I have played $3,000 dollar guitars in music stores does this mean this Yamaha is only 16% the quality of a 3K Martin? No. This has some excellent stats and sounds great. My friend who plays semi pro played the Yama and he said I made a good decision.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sounds AMAZING.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! My friends and I sing together and 6 of them play (I’m learning). I brought this and they all took turns playing it, they love the way it sounds. Many of their guitars are a lot more expensive and all want to buy this one now. I bought bone replacements for the plastic parts with this and swapped them out first thing. Here’s the link: Blisstime 6 String Acoustic Guitar Bone Bridge Saddle and Nut and 6pcs Guitar Bone Bridge Pins Made of Real Bone
customer_reviews.author: NML

customer_reviews.title: My 15-year-old son loved his new guitar
customer_reviews.text: My 15-year-old son loved his new guitar. I chose it because it has a solid spruce top which I hope really opens up for him. Next on the list this month: Strings! Great instrument for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, good value
customer_reviews.text: Moved to an apartment and wanted a good guitar that would sounds great but not loud like drednoughts. Yamaha FS830 is a good looking and great sounding guitar. It’s plenty loud but controllable and works well enough in an apartment or anywhere you want to keep it down a bit. Good quality guitar throughout. Might want to change strings. Some have said they changed out bridge and nut. I didn’t do that. String spacing is a bit tight. But overall I like this FS830 a lot. Great value too.
customer_reviews.author: P. Maguire

customer_reviews.title: This is a good bag for such a low price. I'm totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent guitar for the price. Overall construction and detail is actually better than a lot of high end guitars. The playability right out of the box is unbelievable. I would highly recommend this guitar to anyone. I personally have a high end that retails near 5K and this Yamaha seems even better. One can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: william g rosner

customer_reviews.title: Simply an excellent guitar. Sounds and plays great
customer_reviews.text: Simply an excellent guitar. Sounds and plays great. If you are wondering whether to go with a dreadnought or concert body, I'd go with the concert. I originally got a dread, but it was too bulky and not very comfortable to play. The concert body is much easier to play, especially if you like to play while lying down. I'd go with the Rosewood body. It sounds crisper and better. You can't go wrong with this guitar. It's an excellent acoustic to begin with if you're just getting into playing.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Roberts

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Received the guitar quickly, Its beautiful, and it sounds great. I am very happy with it. Wanted to add an update, I still love the guitar, but I am going to get it set up, it is extremely hard for me to play bar cords, open cords is about all I can play. I will update again after the setup.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scratches on the top of my brand new FG830
customer_reviews.text: This guitar is an great value for the money, and the sound is amazing. The problem is that the one I received from Amazon had deep scratches on the solid top (see attached photo). The boxes it came in were in great shape, so I have to assume the guitar went into the box in this condition. Needless to say, this item is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: StockMan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dusk sun guitar
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dusk sun guitar. I was concerned how small it was going to be, but it turned out to be the perfect size for me. I feel that the natural size guitar is too big, so this one was sized just right. I was informed that it was easier to play as well due to its size. Very happy with the purchase and I'm confident that it would get me to the level I want to be.
customer_reviews.author: Vinh

customer_reviews.title: I assure you it won’t sound or play better than an Fg830
customer_reviews.text: Feel free to spend more money on an acoustic guitar, I assure you it won’t sound or play better than an Fg830.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen K.

customer_reviews.title: Don't question yourself...get this guitar!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I brought a guitar!!! I've always wanted to learn but have convinced myself that I'll never be able to do it. Eventually, I gave up that thought and just went for it. And I'm sooooo glad I did. The music therapist at my job tuned it for me right out the box and he commented on how GOOD this guitar is. He said it's "an excellent piece of equipment" and he said he would even buy one for his collection. This guy has a $2k guitar and said he would even buy this one!!! Wow!!! Don't question yourself...get this guitar!
customer_reviews.author: A.Blessing

customer_reviews.title: Great Guitar shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't really keen on ordering a guitar online but I gave it a shot considering al stores are closed due to the coronavirus. I ordered the Yamaha FG830 guitar without the gig bag. I tracked the shipping which came pretty fast. After unpacking the guitar I examined it throughly no damage the only thing I had to was tune it which I expected and eventually will change the strings. Removed the plastic cover on the pick plate and it sounds great which amazes me because it's not an expensive guitar but looks and certainly sounds like one.
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: This really is a nice guitar. The fit & finish is flawless and ...
customer_reviews.text: This really is a nice guitar. The fit & finish is flawless and tone is really nice. Easy to play as well. I have no idea what brand of strings are on there, but they sound surprisingly good. Buy it and enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: H8Crime

customer_reviews.title: Great Guitar for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and he was really impressed and most importantly it inspired him to practice regularly. He was using a friend's acoustic and my son found this guitar to be noticeably better. He mentioned it stayed in tune much better than what he was using also. What I like about it is the price. He can take it to church or if he plays out one day, he doesn't have to worry about someone walking off with his $1000 Martin or stepping on the neck or something stupid like that. He can play it and enjoy it. That's the most important thing.
customer_reviews.author: Tony P

customer_reviews.title: Great instrument, great price!
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion Yamaha makes one of the best quality instruments for the money. This guitar looks and sounds like a much higher end guitar. The price point is great. Can’t go wrong with this guitar. I use this as my main practice instrument as I try to keep the wear and tear off my high end guitars. So happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mueller

customer_reviews.title: great sound, with minor mods
customer_reviews.text: to get a Martin sound out of this guitar, replace the plasics with bone. be sure the neck is correct,, use light strings and you will be amazed at the improved tone- VERY good and very pleased. It rivals $2000 guitars
customer_reviews.author: Skip Howland

customer_reviews.title: Sounds, feels, and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm just learning guitar, but I bought this one a couple of months after renting one and this sounds (looks and feels) amazing! I feel like it is great quality, and bought it based on other reviews and research. I have not been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D Kip

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra over FS 800
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Acoustic version. Quality of craftsmanship is shockingly high at this price. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Buyer B.

customer_reviews.title: Great little guitar
customer_reviews.text: I am a smaller framed guy with small hands, this guitar fits me like a glove and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell S.

customer_reviews.title: A joy to hold and play.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful guitar with a beautiful tone. The action is a bit high and there is a slight buzzing on the high string, and both can be corrected, but I wish we did not have to. Otherwise we are very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: beybandit

customer_reviews.title: looks and sounds and plays great
customer_reviews.text: this is a way better guitar than it has any right to be for the price, great fit and finish
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great, fun little guitar to play in the living room
customer_reviews.text: I bought the fs800 first. It arrived in poor conditiion and i didn't like the guitar. I sent it back and bought the fs830. Its fantastic. I great guitar for the money. perfect for around the house. not as loud as a dreadnaught. nice finish with the binding around the body and up the fret board. I got the Tobacco Sunburst color. Looks fantastic. Its worth the extra hundred bucks to up grade to the 830. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Randall J. Bohl

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with  this guitar.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent guitar. New, out of box , played great, just the tone I wanted from spruce and rosewood. It's just gonna get better. Have played it for hours everyday for a week. Also purchased some ebony pegs and bone saddle that I will install at next string change. Very pleased with this product. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money- great quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 14 year old daughter for Christmas and she loves it! It sounds wonderful and very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Hall

customer_reviews.title: Best for the money
customer_reviews.text: If you want a playable nice sounding guitar for a great price, this is it. In my head-to-head comparison the sound quality beats the epiphone hummingbird, the other guitar I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Surfer Hank

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Beautiful guitar with a warm, full tone.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sharer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Beautiful finish and sound, thousands of dollars less than the more expensive top name brands.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hegel

customer_reviews.title: I am a beginner and made a good choice.
customer_reviews.text: Working good so far and I like it, sounds great and easy to tune using my iPad. Seems well built but time will tell and if you buy this one I think you will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ernie

customer_reviews.title: Great Guitar
customer_reviews.text: Mine had shipping damage when it arrived. One call to Amazon customer service, problem solved! Got to love Amazon Amazing sounding guitar, the action is high but easily fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Really like the look, sound, and quality of this guitar. It’s a beautiful instrument and I grow to like it even more as time goes by and and I play it more.
customer_reviews.author: dlb

customer_reviews.title: Decent low price guitar
customer_reviews.text: The intonation is a bit off but then it is not a high dollar guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Percy AllanO

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy to see no cosmetic damage whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: This guitar was sold as a warehouse item. When I got it, I was so happy to see no cosmetic damage whatsoever. This guitar came in so nice and without a scratch even with a damaged box packaging as indicated. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dong Ramientos

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: New to guitar and I didn’t want to invest too much before I knew I would stick with it. Couldn’t be happier. Sounds great and fits my needs well.
customer_reviews.author: AGoutdoors

customer_reviews.title: This Yammer ROCKS
customer_reviews.text: I cannot imagine a better guitar for 3 times the price! tone is excellent, quality is superior. LOVE IT! Play on!!!
customer_reviews.author: BL Henthorn

customer_reviews.title: Came with broken string
customer_reviews.text: Well technically it didn't come broken but the moment i tried to tune it (i swear i didn't even turn a full circle) and the 'G' string broke. Now i have to get a replacement string set before i could even get to use this guitar. well other than that the guitar looks quite alright.
customer_reviews.author: Haoyang

customer_reviews.title: Underrated tone and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great tone and quality, satisfying heft and the sense you’re playing a much more expensive instrument.
customer_reviews.author: _ddubb_

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: GORGEOUS sound, gorgeous instrument; stunning. No complaints whatsoever; sleek, beautiful, love it.
customer_reviews.author: JMJ

customer_reviews.title: beautiful sound
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my teenager son. He loves it so much. It sounds just amazingly beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Jinny

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I don’t often review products but I felt on this one I should. very pleased with the sound and appearance of this guitar. No it is not a Martin but for the money a very nice guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful guitar and affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful guitar and affordable price. I felt like i got very good deal on this product. Came as described and on time. I am happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: hari

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier with this purchase. Great sounding guitar, well made, and a bargain at $300.
customer_reviews.author: John Walker

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Amazing guitar 🎸, absolutely worth every penny. Well built acoustic electric with superb sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Super guitar bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: The instrument is very well made for the price, it is added as my 3rd acoustic guitar and I really enjoy it. Great tone and playability, it’s quite a bit smaller than my others, so it feels quite nice, compact depth makes playing very comfortable. Really can’t go wrong for that price!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Ziegelmann

customer_reviews.title: Awesome playability
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to play. Great for intermediate guitarist looking for something they can practice with, and take around with them. Addicting to play. Doesn't sound amazing, but not bad at all by any means. Been playing for years, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Brighton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound!
customer_reviews.text: The sound in this Guitar is excellent! Plays very smooth!
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: this guitar is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: As a beginner, this guitar is perfect for me. It is well-crafted.
customer_reviews.author: limteng

customer_reviews.title: Amazing guitar & bundle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a beginner. It is absolutely amazing. I did quite a bit of research, and I decided that this one was the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Need better quality control
customer_reviews.text: When i open the box i was really happy with the gutar until i noticed a dent in the top. since this is my first guitar dont know if it will affect sound
customer_reviews.author: CharlieGonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful guitar for the money, you won’t find anything comparable at this price point. Sounds like a guitar 3x the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Gonzalski

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Great guitar for the price. I will have this baby for a LONG time.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Perales

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha's rock
customer_reviews.text: One of the best cheap guitar's you'll find. Great sound and playability for the price!
customer_reviews.author: D S

customer_reviews.title: Best Value
customer_reviews.text: Yamaha provides the best value in acoustic guitars. For around $300 you get a guitar that looks great, is built flawlessly, and sounds like guitars 3 times the price.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH A. HEAPHY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding! Surprisingly better then more expensive guitars. I also own a Martin and this will give it a run for the money, unless I plug the Martin to an amp.
customer_reviews.author: SignalStream

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Seems a little big, but I will get use to it. New and learning but very good sound quality. Beautiful guitar.
customer_reviews.author: BDBusDriver

customer_reviews.title: The guitar is great
customer_reviews.text: First time online buy a guitar, it look good and sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son. He spends 2-3 hours every day playing on it and loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Srikant

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned it would cone damaged, but it came In perfect condition! My husband loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and plays great
customer_reviews.text: You really can’t beat it for the money. Looks great and plays great.
customer_reviews.author: Joe A

customer_reviews.title: nice tuning.
customer_reviews.text: good sound. use it to practice. BTW, it could be better to have a bag.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Secondhand!
customer_reviews.text: Many scratches. I paid for a new fg830 but Amazon sent me a secondhand one.
customer_reviews.author: APhape

customer_reviews.title: It's way worth it over the basic beginner guitars in ...
customer_reviews.text: It's way worth it over the basic beginner guitars in the $150-250 range, the lower notes on this play with authority, and with true tone.
customer_reviews.author: duc359

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Need to have set up. Does not keep tuning accurate. Just need to tighten up a tad.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Carter

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to donate for a fundraiser, Easterseals, it went very well. I was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Jauregui

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Amazing and Beautiful Guitar
customer_reviews.text: Sounds Amazing. A huge step-up from the FS800 a 50% increase in price but the value is phenomenal. Not only do you get a better sounding guitar, but you also get a guitar that's a sight to behold. Get this one over the FS820 and FS800, you won't be disappointed. I purchased the FS800 first at guitar center and I loved it but I was left wanting more and the colors available didn't suit my palette. I am glad I kept looking for a guitar and found this one. Remarkable, and a must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jose G Torres Jr

customer_reviews.title: Buy one!
customer_reviews.text: I find it hard to believe that you can buy such a high quality instrument for this price. Sounds great, keeps it's tune very well. I bought a good case for it, because this is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ebben

customer_reviews.title: Plastic, Hollow saddle
customer_reviews.text: Very good guitar for the money. For the more advanced player this is an ideal "take camping-to the beach" guitar. Light weight, easy to carry. Be aware that the fingerboard is fairly narrow...1 -11/16th" nut width (I believe). The action was high, so as part of my setup I replaced the saddle (lowered) with a bone saddle...curiously the factory shipped saddle was hollow plastic with four small holes in the bottom. The result was slightly less bass, but very pleasing...I liked it better!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: With that being said I must say this is a beautiful guitar. It resonates nice and clear on the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first 6 string guitar so I didn't want to spend big bucks on an American made instrument. I had to grit my teeth and purchase a guitar made in China. It just felt wrong. With that being said I must say this is a beautiful guitar. It resonates nice and clear on the high notes as well as the low. It's well with the price. The first thing I did was swap out the plastic nut, saddle, and pins for bone.
customer_reviews.author: Bower C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Guitar
customer_reviews.text: Really nice playing and sounding guitar. Price well justified in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bug

customer_reviews.title: FG830 Dreadnought Acoustic is the best sounding guitar i ever played, even when compared to $2,000 guitars at guitar center.
customer_reviews.text: O..M..G! i was blown away by the richness of the sound from this quitar, the build is truly amazing! even the experienced players in Guitar Center Were surprised when compared to their favorite make. if you can try it out at your guitar store, please do your ears will thank you :D
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha FS830
customer_reviews.text: Yamaha FS830 Sounds great and perfect size for travel or just setting in my recliner. I know recliner ! Not a pro so don't care what you think of my sound or playing. I'm not doing it for you but for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a good enough player to give more of an experienced review ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm just newly getting back into playing the guitar and the FG800 is working well. I'm not a good enough player to give more of an experienced review but I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: The guitar sounds cheaper. No pegs to hang the shoulder strap.
customer_reviews.author: Jolly M

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husbands birthday. He loves it! Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Haberkorn

product_meta.title: Yamaha FG830 Solid Top Folk Guitar, Natural
product_meta.description: Style:Acoustic| Size:Dreadnought| Color:Natural| Configuration:Guitar OnlyRich overtones and improved sustain thanks to the rosewood back and sides deliver improved sound through greater depth. The appearance, with abalone inlay around the sound hole, is more luxurious and an obvious step-up.
feature_bullets: This guitar has an adjustable truss rod

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars203 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
